name: Space Force One: Rail Cannon Defense
name_original: Space Force One: Rail Cannon Defense
description:
Defend Earth from an onslaught of asteroids by using the newly built Rail Cannon Defense system.

CONTROLS

[A] - [D] : Orbit CCW and CW respectively

[SPACE] Shoot

Shoot down the rockets for upgrades.

This game was made for JimJam #2. The theme was Ourobouros, so I represented that with a rail system around Earth.

Let me know what you thought, any feedback would be greatly appreciated.

I didn't do the sfx, so don't rate me for that.
